name: Dublin Capital Partners
overview:
Dublin Capital Partners is a Lenfest Enterprise fund with a mandate to identify and grow businesses in the advertising software, digital media and technology enabled service markets.

As a strategic co-investor, we work with specific funds and partners and seek to advantage portfolio companies through the contribution of capital, operational experience, domain knowledge and relationships uniquely available across the Lenfest network and organization.

We are passionate about being more than money. We work with our exceptional CEO’s and our business partners to build great companies, ones that deliver value and compelling value propositions to all their stakeholders.

funding_round.source_description: Performline Receives Additional Financing; Launches PerformMatch
